content: the all colors mandala pattern works best with many different colors and it s perfect for using small amounts of yarn left over from other projects i prefer to use cotton yarn for my mandalas but any yarn works for this pattern more information about which yarn i used and the amount of yarn can be found in the pattern if you use the same hook size and yarn suggested in the pattern the mandala measures approx 30 cm in diameter ❀ ❀ ❀ **stitches used in this pattern ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet and double_crochet us terms ❀ ❀ ❀ **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout is a social group where you can get support and be inspired by other fellow crocheters welcome https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout/ ❀ ❀ ❀ this pattern have been fully tested thank you kathy haire agneta lagerkrans and pauina smith maraboli for your great work and feedback with this pattern ❀ ❀ ❀
